10 - > 2
52 -> 128-64-32-16-8-4-2-1 (52-32=20)(20-16=4)(4-4=0)
00110100

2 ->10
10010

8 -> 2 
64 -> 110 100

2 -> 10
110100 -> 52

** 8 -> 10 = 8 -> 2 -> 10

16 -> 2 -> 10
0123456789abcdef
0 a 8 ->  0000 1010 1000 -> 10101000 -> 8 + 32 + 128 = 168

10 -> 2 -> 16
120 -> 64-32-16-8 -> 0111 1000 -> 7 8 -> 01111000 



1110101 -> 1 + 4 + 16 + 32 + 64 = 117






100100 -->4+32 = 36
50 --> 110 010
732 --> 111 011 010
732 --> 0111 0011 0010
fff --> 1111 1111 1111
c04 --> 1100 0000 0100
0123456789abcdef






658 -> 658-512 = 146 - 128 = 18 - 16 = 2 
0010 1001 0010 = 292
